content.detailedDescription: In 2002 my friend derek and i were traveling north on 95 coming back from boston where we were hanging out at the boston common. he was driving and i was in the passenger seat. we were a little before topsfeild ma around 10 pm when i noticed a parked car on the side of the highway with a man standing next to it with his attention to the sky, i didnt think anything of this and we just continued forward.I was looking to my right out the passenger window when i noticed this weird shaped craft moving very slow it was probably 100ft up or so. the weirdest thing was the shape i kept trying to put to an image what i was looking at it had all theese weird angles to it and first i thought it was a stealth fighter or something now im only 16 so a stealth is pretty cool to see. but then i realized it wasn't a stealth and it seemed to defy the laws of physics. i turned to my freind and he was still content driving, at this point we were going around a curve in the highway and i looked up again. this time it was right over us and i could see the bottom perfectly if i had had a phone then or a camera there would be 100% evidence of other life no doubt about it. the craft was black all angles were equal meaning any point could have been the front. it had one bright circular steady white light in each corner and a smaller steady red light in the middle. now it was moving so slow that i swear i watched it for atleast 10 min but then it gets weirder im looking at the bottom veiw of the craft as its flying south were still traveling north all of a sudden the front white light disappears now this thing is only 25 ft above us and i should still be able to see the front light then as it keeps moving the back 2 lights disappear as well. i feel so weird looking at this thing i still dont have words to describe it. it was silent as it glided toward the old danvers ma mental assylum which is along the highway sw of us amd out the back window i see this thing hovering above the roof i mean inches above it. we turned around to pursue it but didnt find anything. another very weird aspect of all this is we didnt get home till after midnight and we should have been home by 11 pm at the latest. ive never forgotten this as long as ive lived and this event has seriously changed my life.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving down higjway and seen triangle object 3 bright white lights one on each corner red light in the middle. it was flying very low maybe 50 ft moving 10-20 mph it flew over me and i was stupifyed beyond capacity i watched it up close for atleast 10 mi

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was outside my apartment having a cigarette with my neighbor and her friend when the event took place. it was a very peaceful evening, quiet, good weather, scattered clouds. which made it an ideal day for looking at stars.
2. after while of stargazing i caught a fast moving object out of the corner of my eye.
3. originally i thought this object was a low satellite or some military aircraft, as nato is doing aircraft training exercises in the area.
4. the object(s) in question composed of a v-shaped formation, several(9-1) orbs or star-like balls of light. it was moving at speeds i have never seen before. at an estimated mach 5-10, depending on altitude (which i estimate at 50,000 - 100,000 feet)  this formation had a solid v-shape, however, two other objects orbited around the solid formation in a very unnatural manner. the main formation moved in a straight line of flight, with the orbiting objects following it the entire way. i observed no sound from this object. 
5. my feelings during this event were sheer disbelieve and amazement. i pointed up and asked if my neighbor or her friend saw the object. unfortunately, by the time they looked up and i pointed them in the right direction, the object was gone. i felt a very odd sensation after seeing the object, almost like the hairs on the back of my neck were standing up. however i have had no negative feelings about the object. it interested and fascinated me. 
6. i lost sight of the object when it went behind the clouds, it was only visible for about 5-8 seconds total. 

-i want to thank whoever has taken the time out of their day to read and review my report. this object i have observed is not the first i have seen since i have moved to denmark. i have observed six (not including this event) other instances of ufos in my area. i am certain this last event will not be the last. due to the speed and unpredictability of said objects, i have not been able to get much photo or video records. however i will make steps to further investigate on my own time and collect proper evidence. which i will send to mufon directly.  i would very much like to work together with mufon and solve this as a team. any and all feedback or contact from mufon would be greatly appreciated. thank you for your time and your work.
content.summary: The object(s) were in a v-shaped formation. nine star-sized lights in total were witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: We 1st spotted the orb 30 miles south of phoenix az. traveling south to roswell. the orb stayed on our left n nw for 45 minutes. then it it began to move overhead. so we stopped and started taking pictures. at that point it seemed to stop moving. we began back on the road and it started moving again.  we drove onto vaughn nm and stopped at last store. i went inside a d ask the man working to see it. him his wife and several others seen the orb. as we travelled on to roswell we could see it as it became star-like in the distance. one hell of an exciting experience. we have many pictures and video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: . a large  orb moving against the wind

content.detailedDescription: We were driving north on i-95 when we noticed 2 entities side by side. each entity had 2 lights like headlights. the lights were softly blinking. as we were looking at them... a 3rd light appeared above one light. then a right light appeared the other... forming a sort of rectangle. the objects appeared to be stationary... but after watching them for a few seconds, one started to move west. what looked like just floating lights... all of a sudden, changed into a plane. the 3rd light that had appeared did the same thing. it was stationary for a while before all of a sudden, it started moving and looked like a "plane". the last remaining "headlight" looking objects remained stationary. we are driving on the highway going between 60-70 mph.... we were getting closer and closer to it all while it remained stationary. then, like the others, as soon as got close enough to kind of see it, it began to move and then become like a "plane". however, before it did this... it changed from 2 lights, to 3 like a triangle (you can see that in my video). it was not a plane. first of all, it was a lot lower than a plane should ever be (even if it were that low, you would see the shape of the plane), you would hear it (it was completely silent) and a car going 60 mph could never catch up to a plane like that. it was very bizarre.
content.summary: Multiple hovering lights

content.detailedDescription:
July 2014 i was taking pictures of a lightning storm over my home town of gloucester, england. i was using a random series of automatic sub-second rapid shots trying to capture a lightning fork for my instagram. 

after trawling through hundreds of failed shots i found what appears to be something moving fast in a spiral like fashion across the sky perpendiculur to the thunderstorm i was taking pictures of. so surprised because i didnt see it while i was taking the photo so i cant add any information about the experience unfortunately.

bear in mind that the images were taken a fraction of a second apart - it must have been travelling fairly fast.

can i ask that any reusuage of the photos i provide be properly attributed to myself?
content.summary: Unknown object moving very fast in corkscrew spiral perpendicular to thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a piss outside by a small brick utility building about 1 mile east of valley city, near a teaerp gas station and i was facing north when i seen these lights appear in front of me i think it was maybe a mile out or so there was street lights and buildings i could see and the craft was beyond that. judging the size of this thing was hard to tell but it was massive. i would say bigger them a football field wide. it had very bright lights facing downward. i never seen anything like it in my life. my heart is atill racing almost an hour later. this was so big there had to be other people who seen it.
content.summary: About 7-8 lights very bright hovering nw of valley city headed sw

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger on a 19 seater beachcraft (at the time america west airlines).  we we're flying from prescott to phoenix.  at cruising altitudes a green orb slightly bigger then a soft ball slowly passed outside my window, from the front of the aircraft to the back. the orb passed by very slowly.  about .5 mph.  it was a dull green color, like a tennis ball. it did not look metalic or shiney.  kind of blury.  oddly enough i was very calm.  almost passified.  i will never forget.
content.summary: Green orb passes airplane

content.detailedDescription: i didn't post video this phenomenon happens once or twice a week we looked at it through binoculars is a bunch of dancing lights along around large object located approximately above or close to argonne national laboratory's and we have video and other people have witnessed it coming to our house
content.summary: Flashing pulsing like to run large object

content.detailedDescription:
I was parked at back beach car park in new plymouth,nz at about 3.30am i noticed a waterfunnel forming bout half a mile off the coast.I watched it for 6mins then a metallic craft with different colored light around it rose out the top of funnel,sat there for bout 30 seconds then took off straight up in sky.
i never told anybody cos theyd think i was nuts...
content.summary: Looked like funnel of water off coast then craft shot out of it fast.

content.detailedDescription: Sept 1, 2016, around 5:30 a.M., going to my truck to go to work. it was a beautiful, cool morning still very dark and a lot of stars shining. out of habit i always look up at the sky to check the weather. i always look for satellites while i'm looking, have done this since i was a kid and saw the first sputnik. immediately i saw what looked like a satellite, almost directly overhead, maybe to the west a little, and it was heading in a westerly path. i kept watching it for a few seconds when it abruptly stopped and started moving to the left 90deg for a short time, then reversed and went the opposite direction and then turned west again. since it was early morning and i had not been awake for more than around 30 min., i thought my eyes might be playing tricks so i leaned up against my truck with my head steady and tried to lock on to the stars around where i was looking so i could make sure the movements were what they seemed to be, and they were. the stops were abrupt and change of direction was immediate. i am a former private pilot and try to keep up with the latest aviation technology, and i know we have nothing that can do this, either manned or unmanned. if i remember correctly, orbit speed is around 17,000mph and you cant stop abruptly and turn. i can honestly say this is the first time in my life that i have seen something like this that i can't explain. i can't say with 100% certainty, but this object seemed to be in orbit, not just a high flying object in the atmosphere. it did not glow, but seemed to reflect light just like a satellite, and it was not unusually bright. i am more or less a skeptical person, not dismissing any possibilities, but i have to see something to believe. experiencing this phenomena has changed the way i think about our place in the universe, not in a bad way but just different. i have no witnesses, no physical proof, nor am i convinced that this was extraterrestrial, but do consider the possibility. unfortunately, i had to go to work and never saw where this object went or what happened to it.
content.summary: Looked like satellite almost directly above heading west when i noticed it stop and turn 90deg, start, reverse and repeating several times

content.detailedDescription:
Video is from cnbc covering spacex rocket explosion on launch pad 40 on 9/1/16 at approximately 0907.
slowing down the video, you can see an orb-like object come into view from the right of the right tower, near where the tower grid work stops and the pole starts. rocket has not yet exploded. this is at the 3 second mark.
next frame: object is now just left of the middle tower at the same height and the explosion starts.
next frame: 4 second mark – object is a little more to the left of the middle tower. it is almost halfway between the middle tower and the rocket.
next frame: object is between the rocket and left tower and has picked up speed.
next frame: the object slows down and is just right of the left tower. it is still at the same height.
next frame: the object is now at the left edge of the frame and is going out of the frame.
next frame: it is out of the frame.
next frame: still out of the frame.
next frame: the object re-enters the frame from the left and is low and left of the left tower.
next frame: the object shoots up at approximately a 45º angle toward the middle of the rocket.
next frame: object is behind the left tower.
next two frames seem to freeze.
next frame: object is on the right of the left tower and continues to head for the middle of the rocket. a second object appears to the left of the middle tower, between the tower and the rocket.
next frame: the first object continues toward the rocket. the second object disappears behind the rocket nose cone. 
several more frames as the object continues toward the middle of the rocket.
next frame: the object disappears behind the explosion.
3rd frame: the object appears to come out from behind the explosive fireball and continues to climb to the right. it’s now between the fireball and the middle tower.
next frame: the object is now just left of the middle tower.
next frame: the object reverses direction on a dime, climbs and is now just above the rocket nose cone.
next frame: a second object appears between the right and middle towers. the first object is still over the nose cone.
next frame: the first object is hovering over the nose cone, while the second object reverses direction and climbs.
next frame: the first object continues to hover, while the second object continues gaining altitude and is located between the middle and the right tower.
next frame: the second object disappears while at the same time, the first object doubles in size.
5 second mark: next two frames freeze.
next frame: the first object rises.
next two frames freeze.
next frame: the first object continues to rise slowly.
next two frames freeze.
next frame: the first object continues to rise slowly.
next two frames freeze.  
next frame: the first object continues to rise slowly.
next frame: the object hovers and moves slightly left.
next several frames show the object hovering, while moving slowly to the left.
6 second mark: the object disappears behind the fireball, not to be seen again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb-like object seen before and after explosion of spacex rocket on launch pad.

content.detailedDescription:
This is a huge phenomenon that i’m extremely interested in, since i too have had a couple of ufo sightings. one in particular together with my wife. i wanted this one to be well documented and my wife didn't want to be questioned. hence, i asked her a ton of questions to clarify the event and sighting for others.

my wife was headed west on court street in clearwater, fl on august 24th, 2016. she called me to tell me she was taking a picture of the beautiful sunset. after the event, she told me it reminded her of a megaphone pointing to the sky. so while we're on the phone, no words have been exchanged yet as she takes the first photo. i heard her saying something but couldn't make it out, then i heard her exclaim. she told me that she yelled, "nick!! i got a picture of an alien!!" the interval between the first picture and second was 16 seconds apart. we were only on the phone for no more than 30 seconds as she took these two pictures. the timestamps in the filenames are 20160824_200518 and 20160824_200534. the second picture was taken 2 blocks down, where she had slowed down the car enough to capture the photo as it went out of view. 

she came home and we reviewed the picture. originally i thought that the black ball emerged from the top shadowy arc. she said it was actually moving as a single object in a northwesterly direction. it was moving over or towards the scientology hq it seemed. the ufo hovered and began travel again. she was able to snap a picture as she looked back and forth from plain sight to the camera view. she described it as if the sky was blowing a bubble and this ufo appeared. she also stated it was blurry, even in plain sight and that’s why she was doing double takes between the cam and sky.

i recently read that they're caught during sunrise and sunset due to the refraction of light and their cloaking technology. if that's so, this looks like it may have been only partially cloaked. articles i’ve read have also stated that they appear a lot near lightning strikes. it was across from a gigantic funnel shaped storm cloud that i started recording live on facebook after she called me about the sighting. all i was able to catch was a few fierce lightning strikes but in reviewing the video, nothing appeared to stand out. i’m sure it was long gone or hidden at this point.
content.summary: Ufo spotted over scientologist hq! aug. 24, 2016

content.detailedDescription:
Was a lightning storm over our house. was out in front yard trying to video lightning bolts. was taking videos in 30 second increments. when watching videos later. noticed extreamly fast flying object cross screen. 
  have been having trouble sending the video to people. seems to be sent at a lower pixel quality. i have posted the video on utube under. ufo. used my name. has @130 hits so for.
content.summary: Extreamly fast moving cylinder shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
me and my friend were driving along rt 23 when we noticed a glowing light in the cloud cover. we both thought the same thing that it was a bit of twilight color poking through the clouds - but then we noticed that there was no afterglow of the sunset in the clouds.
   as we kept our attention on this glowing spot, we kept driving in that exact direction. light sprinkle rain was coming down - but i was able to get my head out the window and get a good look.
  after a few more minutes i was able to see that the one light had changed into three distinct different areas of the cloud cover being lit up. 
  we think we were watching this for about 7 minutes.
  as we got to the town of elverson, we had to go up and down some hills where we could not see that portion of the sky. as we emerged up at the top of the hill in morgantown - we could tell that these lights were no longer there.
content.summary: clouds lit up - stationary, then split into 3 lights

content.detailedDescription:
August 30, 2016, 4:30 am.

i was getting into my vehicle to go to work and looked up at the sky. 
the light first seemed to be an airplane but it didn't move. i next noticed that this star was blinking so i took out my cell phone to take a picture because i thought it was a planet but planets don't change colors like it was doing and it seemed pretty big for a star, which i thought was weird, didn't seem right. 
it was blinking, seemed close but if it was a star it should be far away. i noticed that it was right below orion at the horizon, in the eastern sky.  i took out my cell phone and began taking pictures and then took a short video of this blinking star-like round circle that first i thought had looked like a star, then maybe a planet but later i really didn't know what it was. but, it changed colors from green and then orange-red in this pattern over and over again, not moving but stationary in the sky. 
during the observation, i took a video and pictures of the blinking circle. i don’t know what happened to the blinking circle because after i finished taking the video and pictures, i posted the pictures on facebook, commenting that i thought it could be a ufo. 
i got in my car and went to work.
video comments: "i don't know this is pretty weird, looks like a star, but its blinking green and orange or red, and it seems awfully close i mean that far away."
content.summary: Getting into car to go to work looked up at the stars noticed a weird bright star-like orb at base of orion above horizon, weird, blinking green, orange-red, later thought it was a ufo, took pictures video

content.detailedDescription: I was nj gsp northbound around 125 mile marker.  i pulled over to observe 5-8 disappearing and reappearing orange glowing lights slowy moving in random directions.  then 2 of them started emmiting like a dripping molten metal looking substance.  it was really bizzare.  event only lasted about 3 minutes.  the objects weren't very high it seemed.  they were west of my position .
content.summary: Multiple orange lights with drippings

content.detailedDescription:
i have for the last 3 years tried to find the right person to tell my story too and collect as much info on it as i most possibly can find and its been quite the adventure doing so here we go.
it all started in fairbanks al in the late 70s my dad worked on the alaskan pipeline and we lived near a air force base were i would be playing outside on playgrounds like every kid, the thing that i remember the most was trying to talk to my mom and other kids and they all seemed to be in a kinda sleep mode type stage i would talk to them but not much of a response back, and the other children i played with were a little different then me and were fine except they just sounded and looked a little different but i thought not much of it.
we soon moved to sacramento when i was around 6 and this is when it got serious for me, at the hottest times of summer (now in the 80s) the beings i now know as the tall whites would wake me up some how and i would play with there children outside, it never seemed that weird to me growing up with and looked forward to seeing them. the older i got tho the more i would see the adults and they would communicate with me. the one time that sticks out the most is when i was out with the family running arones, i was tagging along in the back going into one of many stores my mom was dragging us in and as soon as i walked in i saw the two tall whites walking out, they walked right by me and said " michael be careful" using telepathy like always( u hear them but not with your ears) is the best way to describe it. and then stared and smirked at me, i couldn't stop starring as they walked off then disappeared into the parking lot. but like usual everyone was in a dream like state and couldn't respond to me quickly at all its like there half asleep or something, it doesn't seem to work on me whatever is going on am always alert and fine. i have more details of my events but that sums it up so you have an idea. i also see a lot of ufos and have some pics.
i have some other physical things that are different.
i hope this info helps in some way, i've had a long time to process this and thought it was time to share this. thanks for your time and everything you do.
content.summary: No ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was on holiday in cornwall england on the south coast it was a clear day with no clouds i noticed a rainbow that looked like it was going around the sun and though that would make a google photo this was on the 23rd of august 2016 at 14:42 uk time. i was not till a few days later that i noticed a yellow sphereshape quite close to the sun and when i zoomed in to me it looked like a planet. i searched on good to see if there were any visible planets or comets visible on that time and date and to my amazement there was not. i really don't know what this could be to me i feel really excited that it could be sometime unknown and really gutted that i did not notice it at the time i took the photo
content.summary: A sphere shape that looked like a planet very close to the sun

content.detailedDescription: August 11th around 11:47 pm my fiancée and i were looking at the stars and talking. she lives in the country on 10 acres and the area she lives in has zero light pollution. we were sitting on the back of my cars trunk facing due west and noticed what we thought was a star getting brighter and closer. we both got off of my car and started walking very slowly toward the star but then realized it was an orb and the orb was coming toward us doing a slight zig zag then travelled directly towards us. we both stopped in our tacks and she grabbed my hand and we both were just amazed how beautiful this orb was. it was the size of a beach ball and was glowing an absolute beautiful golden radiant color. it got as close as 30-40 yards from us and made a sharp 90° turn right ( south). it was tree top level when it turned south and out of view. i ran closer to try and get a closer look but it was gone. i'm very upset with myself for not getting my phone out and taking a pic or video but the whole experience lasted 45 seconds to a minute. the orb was so beautiful it just captivated me(us) and we just didn't snap out and get evidence.
content.summary: It was a beach ball sized ord that was a beautiful golden, radiant color

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of buckingham palace from the bridge that crosses the lake in st james park.   i took two pictures of the lake with buckingham palace in the background.  i took the two pictures one after the other less than half a second apart.  

when i downloaded the pictures to my pc. i noticed that there appeared to be an object in the sky above that palace. 

the object does not appear in any of the photographs taken before or after these pictures.  it does not look like dirt on the lens.   i was not aware of anything being there at the time i took the picture.  the pictures are unedited in any way.
content.summary: Two pictures taken together less that one second apart something in second picture

content.detailedDescription: On august 31 a federal agent came to my current residing address in farmington hills in oakland county. i was asked if my name was justin m. and i answered yes. i was then asked what i was doing between the hours of 8pm and 3pm on the 30th of august. i answered i had spent the night with my girlfriend and watched videos online. he then asked me what is my knowledge of extraterrestrials? i answered i have been researching conspiracy theories about other life then human beings and i believed in extraterrestrials. i was then basically told that any further research into the topics of extraterrestrials , i would be arrested and put in federal prison. the man then walked away and got in his jeep (black cruiser with a x through the license plate and drove away) and drove away.
content.summary: I was approached by a federal agent at 7am approx and questioned about what i knew on extraterrestrials.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking eastward on oakwood ave between park pl and south grove st with my two children in a stroller.  this was on the evening of wednesday  august 31st, 2016 at about 7:50pm.  my son likes to spot airplanes in the sky and so i saw a commercial airliner flying from west to east across the sky and told him to look.  i then noticed that flying next to it was a much smaller craft.  this smaller craft was between 1 and 2 commercial airplane widths (wing tip to wing tip) away from the craft and was matching the commercial airliner's speed exactly.  both craft were leaving a vapor trail, although the commercial airliner produced two tails while this smaller object only produced one.  the commercial airliner seemed to have a dark blue color while the smaller craft was a color between grey and black.  the smaller craft appeared to be about one third of the length of the commercial aircraft (length being from nose to tail).  because of the small size it was difficult to identify a shape to this craft, my best guess is that it was triangular shaped.

i watched the two craft fly eastward side by side in a straight line until the trees blocked my view.  i don't think my son saw either airplane.

my initial thought was, "what the heck is that?".  i work in the aerospace industry as an engineer so i began trying to problem solve what i witnessed.  my first thought that this was another commercial airliner that was flying at a much higher altitude and it just looked like it was flying next to the commercial craft (which would explain the smaller size).  i then thought that this was unlikely because their speeds were matched exactly.  the next thing i thought it could be was a fighter jet escorting the commercial airliner.  i know this happens occasionally if there is a concern on the commercial airliner.  this would explain the greyish-dark color and how to could match the speed of the airliner but also stay so close to it.  this could also explain the vapor trail left behind.  i was thinking possibly an f-16 fighter jet could explain the small size and single vapor trail.

i did not have a smart phone or any camera with me to photograph or film the two aircraft.  after i got home and got the kids in bed (about 8:25pm) i google news search for fighter jets escorting commercial airliners for that evening but didn't see anything reported.  i told my wife what i had witnessed and she thought that it was strange as well.
content.summary: Small craft flying next to commercial airliner

content.detailedDescription: I was at work, outside on lunch break, when me and a few of my employees witnessed a motionless bright spherical object in the sky (west). the object stayed in place for about 9 minutes, with no flashing safety lights (which would be indicative of an airplane or helicopter), after that the object slowly moved to the right (north), and then the object either shrunk or it was exiting our thermosphere, until we could no longer see it. we also noticed that the object was bright, but the object did not emit any glare; as if it was "solid light."
content.summary: Motionless bright orb that remained still and then either left abruptly or shrank

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on the balcony.
looking straightforward with my head slightly upward facing toward the mountain.
knew immediately its a ufo as no airplanes fly around here (far form the airport and its flight paths.
hovering over the mountain looking at me when stopped then carried on hovering n.E direction.
felt intrigued, no fear, good energy from that ship.
carried on hovering until it left my sight and descended (by the looks of it) behind the mountain.
content.summary: Seen the same cigar shape twice this week.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 2 coworkers of mine and i were finishing up our night closing a grocery store. we all commented how quiet the city seemed to be so we were going to go out front and see the stars for a bit and smoke until i left to go home. they were staying another hour or two. as soon as we all walked out and lit our cigarettes, we all looked up at the exact same time in the same direction and saw the brightest orb ever. in less than 3 seconds it swooped a half circle maneuver from our right to our left, towards then away from us until it disappeared completely. it was so fast that it seemed to leave a trail, but not a fading trail. it produced this line and then the entire thing was gone. the manuver would have looked like the letter "u" from a birds eye view looking above it. it made no sound. in fact, though it is a relatively small town it has its share of noise in that area. this is the quietest it has ever been in that town. we all looked at each other and my coworker ray said it must have been a bottle rocket. but, we all paused a minute and agreed it would have popped and faded like fire. this was more like when you are little and you write your name in the air with a stick from the campfire. it couldnt have been a comet because it was far below the clouds. we all then made the connection how funny it was that we had decided to smoke out front. we have never, ever done this. we always go out the back door to smoke. it is just odd, because had we followed our usual routine we would not have been able to see it from that side of the building. after about 5 minutes of lively conversation, talking about the orb. we saw one helicopter lift off from the hospital, 3 airplanes far, far, up into the sky waaaaay above this object. and, we saw and heard a helicopter with no lights, which none of us had ever seen before. this was right after the highway patrol helicopter had flown along the western area of the sky where this occurred. the dark heli was the last one we noticed, but we could barely see it, more so heard it, though we could see an outline of it when it was in front of the cloud covered areas. thanks mufon for all you do.
content.summary: I and 2 other coworkers all happened to be compelled to go out front of our store to see the stars and smoke. as soon as we all looked up, we saw the brightest ball i have ever seen under the clouds, in an instant, dart towards and then away from us.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing at on a street with my half cousin when we seen two bright balls of light fly overhead as it was ascending they did a half spiral-stopped then kept going as if they were flying upside down but all sides and edges were equal i looked the same as if it hadn't changed a bit.
content.summary: It was two golden balls of light flying overhead as it was ascending they did a half spiral-stopped then kept going as if they were flying upside down.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the store from getting a cup of coffee to clo k in for work. as i am walking in the parking lot this light catches my eye. i've never seen anything like this. a flash of light like shooting star. east to west it traveled. it disappeared so quick. the colors were white orange. what creeper me out was earlier that morning i got like 5 books on aliens that same mornings. but that wasn't even on my mind when i saw this flying object.
content.summary: Shooting star like but way too low for that. flash off light and it disappeared in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck, right after a rain storm, taking pictures of the skyline. i didn't see anything until i uploaded my photos and noticed a gray streak in one of the pictures. i enlarged the area and was amazed by what i saw. it was a clear image of what looked like a flying saucer. you could see three lights/windows on the top of the craft.
content.summary: Enlarged gray streak in photo shows clear image of a flying saucer like object

content.detailedDescription: While driving my tanker truck from delivery site..I turned onto harris blvd headed west toward i-485 at approx. 0745 or so and noticed an aerial vehicle i first mistook to be a plane. upon closer examination this caft looked like a cylinder ..Siver in color with gray wing like triangular structures pointing straight down with what appeared to be bolts on the winglike structure facing me. having been in the us navy i can only appear the winglike structures consistency to that of gray painted iron with bolts on it and a wire that looked attached from one wing at back to the cylinder and maybe one at front. the craft traveled at a pretty good pace and crossed from my left to right just over the treetops, and i watched as long as i could before it dissappeared over the trees. i didnt get overly excited as i have seen a closer encounter back in 1973. i never reported that one. i am not sure if this was extraterrestrial in origin or manmade. what is weird is it had no normal propulsion systems..Engines,  rotors or horizontal wings or rudder and stabilizers..Yet it glided with ease over the treetops. i saw it only for a few seconds but it was fairly close and easy to make out detail. no noise from it though my windows were up. i have seen drones before..And that was another thing i thought it might be..But dont think so due to lack of all the things ive seen on large and small drones.  if this is our tech than its pretty advanced stuff.
content.summary: Approx 40 ft cylinder with 2 gray triangilar winglike structures pointing straigjt down witg what looked like a bolts on one i saw

content.detailedDescription: While sitting around fire pit in my back yard with my husband and cousin, we noticed a light that appeared to be floating in the air. directly behind it was a  a large black diamond like shaped object  with another floating light following behind.  it was quiet and the size of at least a football field . stealth like but much larger. my husband said it had glowing lights on top. i just remember it as a black shadow but the lights may have given the appearance of a shadow from the bottom. we were trying to figure out what it was. my feeling was disbelief. it was like swimming underneath water and something huge from above casts a shadow you.  we watched as it was flying north from the river then veered off towards the east until we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Large dark quiet diamond shaped flying object
